title: Configure Network Devices
description: CIS Ubuntu Linux 24.04 LTS Benchmark - Section 3.1: Configure Network Devices

controls.title: Ensure IPv6 status is identified
controls.description: IPv6 provides an virtually unlimited number of IP addresses as well as improving on the feature set of IPv4.
controls.impact: If IPv6 is not to be used, it is recommended that it be disabled to reduce the attack surface of the system.
controls.remediation: Review IPv6 status and disable if not required according to site policy.
controls.expected: IPv6 status reviewed and configured according to policy

controls.title: Ensure wireless interfaces are disabled
controls.description: Wireless networking is used when wired networks are unavailable.
controls.impact: If wireless is not to be used, wireless devices can be disabled to reduce the potential attack surface.
controls.remediation: Run the following command to disable wireless: nmcli radio all off

controls.title: Ensure bluetooth services are not in use
controls.description: Bluetooth is a wireless technology standard used for exchanging data between fixed and mobile devices over short distances.
controls.impact: If Bluetooth is not to be used, it is recommended that bluetooth be disabled to reduce the potential attack surface.
controls.remediation: Run the following commands to disable bluetooth: systemctl --now disable bluetooth && apt purge bluez
